text: Lycée Martin Luther King is a senior high school/sixth-form college in Bussy- Saint-Georges, Seine-et-Marne, France, in the Paris metropolitan area. It is one of at least three schools in France named for slain U.S. civil rights leader Martin Luther King Jr. ==References== ==External links== * Lycée Martin Luther King Category:Lycées in Seine-et-Marne Category:Lycées in Marne-la- Vallée
title: Lycée Martin Luther King (Bussy-Saint-Georges)
